message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll find immense value in it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Can you consider this price?
